content:
# EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Copper Mining and Smelting Setup at (-28, -61)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (-28, -61)
- Stone furnace at (-27, -59)
- Burner inserter at (-25.5, -58.5)
- Wooden chest at (-26.5, -57.5)

### Iron Mining and Smelting Setup at (1, -60)
Consists of:
- Burner mining drill at (1, -60)
- Stone furnace at (2, -56)
- Wooden chest at (1.5, -58.5) containing 73 iron ore
- Burner inserter at (1.5, -57.5)

### Smelting Array at (1, 1)
Two parallel smelting setups:
- Stone furnaces at (1, 1) and (3, 1)
- Wooden chests at (1.5, 3.5) and (3.5, 3.5)
- Burner inserters at (1.5, 2.5) and (3.5, 2.5)
Additional inserter and chest:
- Burner inserter at (5.5, 2.5)
- Wooden chest at (5.5, 3.5)

### Production Line at (2, 7)
Two parallel smelting setups with output collection:
- Stone furnaces at (2, 7) and (4, 7)
- Wooden chests at (2.5, 9.5) and (4.5, 9.5)
- Burner inserters at (2.5, 8.5) and (4.5, 8.5)
- Transfer inserter at (3.5, 9.5)

### Assembly Line Complex (14, 14)
Copper cable and electronic circuit production:
- Assembling machine at (14.5, 14.5) for copper cable
- Assembling machine at (21.5, 15.5) for electronic circuits
- Multiple wooden chests and inserters for material handling
- Storage chest at (21.5, 11.5) containing 15 iron plates and 90 copper cables

### Water and Steam System
- Offshore pump at (-7.5, 25.5)
- Two offshore pumps at (2.5, 34.5) and (2.5, 36.5)
- Boiler at (18, 47.5)
- Steam engine at (29.5, 51.5)
- Multiple pipe groups connecting the system

### Transport System
Multiple belt groups connecting different production areas, forming a logistics network throughout the factory.

# ERROR TIPS

### Placement Errors
- Check for existing entities before placing new structures
- Ensure target location is clear of other objects before placing entities

### Resource Management Errors
- Verify fuel availability before attempting to insert fuel into machines
- Keep track of inventory contents to avoid failed insertion attempts

### Power Network Issues
- Multiple machines are showing "not receiving electricity" warnings
- Ensure proper connection of electrical poles to form a complete power network

### Fluid System Warnings
- Several fluid systems show "No fluid present in connections"
- Ensure proper connection of pipes between fluid producers and consumers
- Verify pipe connections are complete and unbroken

### Machine Operation Issues
- Multiple machines showing "waiting for space in destination" or "waiting for source items"
- Ensure proper input/output connections and material flow between machines
